definition: Hetu Ala (Manchu: Yellow Rock), Nurhaci's capital at the 1619 Battle of Sarhu

to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: The constructuion of Hetula city was the necessity of Nuerhachi s force development.
